elements.name: Intro
elements.html:
2023 LEAD: New Facilitator Summit and Leadership Training: Post-Event Survey

We are interested in learning about all facilitators' experiences during the 2023 New Facilitator Summit and Leadership Training event. Your responses will be shared anonymously with Code.org staff and co-leads running these workshops to help inform summits and other professional learning opportunities in the future.

Thank you for taking a few minutes to complete this survey!

elements.name: intro_comment
elements.html: If you attended more than one LEAD event, please answer this survey for the one you attended most recently.

elements.name: event
elements.title: Which 2023 LEAD Facilitator Training event did you attend?

elements.name: iFeel
elements.title: I feel more prepared to lead Code.org's {course_name} Professional Learning workshops in 2023-24 than I did before this event.

elements.name: connect_facilitator_community
elements.title: Overall, to what extent do you feel connected to the facilitator community after this event?

elements.name: useful_practice
elements.title: What was the most useful thing you learned at this event and why?

elements.name: activities
elements.title: Overall, to what extent did you find the activities engaging?

elements.name: engaging_most
elements.title: What was most engaging for you during the event?

elements.name: engaging_least
elements.title: What was least engaging for you during the event?

elements.name: comment_for_coleads
elements.title: What feedback would you like to share with the co-leads who led your cohort room?

elements.name: event_feedback_matrix
elements.title: Thinking about your experience through this event, how much do you agree with the following statements?

rows.text: I easily navigated the platform (CVENT Website) for the event.
The event communications were clear and helpful leading up to the event.
It was easy to find the online resources I needed for this event.
The Code.org staff was helpful prior to and at the event.
It was easy to find my cohort room.
I had fun at this event.
The location of the event met my needs as a facilitator.
The date of the event met my needs as a facilitator.
The duration of the event met my needs as a facilitator.
Overall, the event was well organized.
I am glad I attended this event.

elements.name: improvement_areas
elements.title: Please use this space to share your thoughts about what can be improved in future events.

elements.name: general_comments
elements.title: If there is anything you would like us to know, please use this space to share.

elements.name: permission
elements.title: I give Code.org permission to quote my written feedback from today for use on social media, promotional materials, and other communications.

choices.text: Yes, I give Code.org permission to quote me.
No, I do not give Code.org my permission.

elements.name: question2
elements.html: Thank you for sharing your responses! If you have any questions about this survey, please contact facilitators@code.org.
